member.name: PackageOrigin
member.summary: Specifies the origin of a package.

member.name: PackageOrigin.PackageOrigin_Store
member.summary: The package originated from the Windows Store.

member.name: PackageOrigin.PackageOrigin_DeveloperUnsigned
member.summary: The package originated as developer unsigned.

member.name: PackageOrigin.PackageOrigin_DeveloperSigned
member.summary: The package originated as developer signed.

member.name: PackageOrigin.PackageOrigin_LineOfBusiness
member.summary: The package originated as a line-of-business app.
